trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, return all cards named Demigod of Revenge from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, haste
trans-unit.target: When you cast this spell, return all cards named Demigod of Revenge from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, haste

trans-unit.resname: PSHM·183★ | Demigod of Revenge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed."\n—*The Seer's Parables*
trans-unit.target: "His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed."\n—*The Seer's Parables*

trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. {R/G}: Target spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: This spell can't be countered. {R/G}: Target spell can't be countered.

trans-unit.source: The stench of bloodcap mushrooms on the breath is enough to ward off even the most potent magics, especially when combined with a special chant: "Hushhh."
trans-unit.target: The stench of bloodcap mushrooms on the breath is enough to ward off even the most potent magics, especially when combined with a special chant: "Hushhh."
